title: A Fresh Start
content:
Last week, we learnt how to conduct a sprint meeting and had our sprint meeting. We now have a Trello board containing all the tasks we have to do. Although any developer can pick any task and work on it, I find that this would not be likely as people will usually be more comfortable with technologies that they have experience in.

Anyway, I still have not found much time to do any work yet. Hopefully after this Thursday I will be more free to start working on the project.
